title: DANCE CRAZE THE BEST OF BRITISH SKA...LIVE! DVD
description:
DANCE CRAZE THE BEST OF BRITISH SKA...LIVE!

VHS to DVD Transfer

I edited out the middle bit with the irritating old footage, cleaned the edges up, normalized the audio, and put in chapters.

I am really pleased with the results, no shitty lines that can appear in VHS and the audio is excellent with no drop outs

The picture is still dark and grainy but that is Dance Craze from VHS!! 

If you want a perfect DVD transfer of the 1988 VHS release then get this torrent!

If you want a perfect remastered picture and sound then you are gonna have to wait until it is professionally cleaned up and officially released on DVD
